errors.default: Something bad happened. Please try again later or contact the system owner.
errors.network: Network error. Please re-check your internet connection and try again.
errors.transaction: Transaction error. Please try again later or contact the system owner.
errors.blockchain-event-type: We should not get here, unhandled { type }

validation.field-error_minLength: This field must contain a minimum of { minLength } symbols
validation.field-error_maxLength: This field must contain a maximum of { maxLength } symbols
validation.field-error_alphaNum: The value must consist of alphanumeric values (A-Z, a-z, 0-9)
validation.field-error_alpha: The value must consist of alphabetic characters (A-Z, a-z)
validation.field-error_uniqueValue: The value is not unique, try another
validation.field-error_email: This field must be a valid email
validation.field-error_phone: This field must be a valid phone number.
validation.field-error_blockIdent: This field must be valid block hash or block number
validation.field-error_mnemonicSed: The value must be mnemonic seed
validation.field-error_hexSeed: The value must be in hex format and consist of { length } characters.
validation.field-error_amountRange: Amount should be in the range from { from } to { to }

messages.council-motion: Voting ends on council motion { id }
messages.democracy-dispatch: Enactment of the result of referendum { id }
messages.democracy-launch: Start of the next referendum voting period
messages.parachain-auction: End of the current parachain auction { id }
messages.parachain-lease: Start of the next parachain lease period { id }
messages.referendum-dispatch: Potential dispatch of referendum { id } (if passed)
messages.staking-epoch: Start of a new staking session { id }
messages.staking-era: Start of a new staking era { id }
messages.staking-slash: Application of slashes from era { id }
messages.society-challenge: Start of next membership challenge period
messages.society-rotate: Acceptance of new members and bids

create-account-form.no-address: The account address will appear here

create-account-seed-step.seed-info: The secret seed value for this account. Ensure that you keep this in a safe place, with access to the seed you can re-create the account.
create-account-seed-step.have-seed-field-lbl: I have saved my mnemonic seed

create-account-confirm-step.info-message-part-1: We will provide you with a generated backup file after your account is created. As long as you have access to your account you can always download this file later by clicking on "Backup" button from the Accounts section.
create-account-confirm-step.info-message-part-2: Please make sure to save this file in a secure location as it is required, together with your password, to restore your account.

create-account-password-step.info-message-part-1: The password and password confirmation for this account. This is required to authenticate any transactions made and to encrypt the keypair.
create-account-password-step.info-message-part-2: Ensure you are using a strong password for proper account protection.

transfer-form-founds-step.full-amount-switch-lbl: Transfer the full account balance, reap the sender
transfer-form-founds-step.info-message-part-1: The transferred balance will be subtracted (along with fees) from the sender account.
transfer-form-founds-step.info-message-part-2: The beneficiary will have access to the transferred fees when the transaction is included in a block.
transfer-form-founds-step.info-message-part-3: If the recipient account is new, the balance needs to be more than the existential deposit. Likewise if the sending account balance drops below the same value, the account will be removed from the state.
transfer-form-founds-step.info-message-part-4: With the keep-alive option set, the account is protected against removal due to low balances.
transfer-form-founds-step.error-message-commission: You do not have enough funds to pay the commission ({ amount }). Please change amount to continue the operation.
transfer-form-founds-step.error-message-amount: You do not have enough funds. Please change amount to continue the operation

transfer-form-authorize-step.info-message-part-1: The details of the transaction including the type, the description (as available from the chain metadata) as well as any parameters and fee estimations (as available) for the specific type of call.
transfer-form-authorize-step.info-message-part-2: The sending account that will be used to send this transaction. Any applicable fees will be paid by this account.
transfer-form-authorize-step.info-message-part-3: Adding an optional tip to the transaction could allow for higher priority, especially when the chain is busy.
transfer-form-authorize-step.info-message-part-4: The call hash as calculated for this transaction

staking-form-founds-step.info-staking-type-1: 24% APY, no lock-up with 1-week notice to unstake, rewards accrue monthly
staking-form-founds-step.info-staking-type-2: 67% APY, lock-up for 3 moons (88 days), rewards unlocked at the end of staking
staking-form-founds-step.info-staking-type-3: 200% APY, lock-up for 6 moons (177 days), rewards unlocked at the end of staking
staking-form-founds-step.info-staking-type-4: 500% APY, lock-up for 12 moons (355 days), rewards unlocked at the end of staking
staking-form-founds-step.info-staking-type-5: 400% APY, lock-up for 24 moons (710 days), 1/4 of the Year 1 rewards are unlocked at the end of Year 1; the remainder is unlocked at  the end of staking
staking-form-founds-step.info-staking-type-6: 300% APY, lock-up for 48 moons (1420 days),  1/3 of Year 1 rewards is unlocked at the end of Year 1; 1/3 of Year 2 rewards is unlocked at the end of Year 2; 1/3 of Year 3 rewards is unlocked at the end of Year 3; the remainder is unlocked at  the end of staking.
staking-form-founds-step.error-message-commission: You do not have enough funds to pay the commission ({ amount }). Please change amount to continue the operation.
staking-form-founds-step.error-message-amount: You do not have enough funds. Please change amount to continue the operation

extrinsic-display.mortal: Mortal, valid from #{ startAt } to #{ endsAt }
